room_title: Escape room "The Moonlight Gallery" by Escape Room Downtown in Canton
review: The Moonlight Gallery was a lot of fun! The puzzles were so clever and cool to solve. Definitely check it out!

room_title: Escape room "The Moonlight Gallery" by Escape Room Downtown in Canton
review: Really fun room. We did the mob hit in the art gallery and finished with 39 seconds left. The clues were hard but not impossible, and it was really exciting. The hint system is pretty good (we used a couple at the end); you can do it without help or ask for one if you think you need it. Great fun, well done with the room and mystery.

room_title: Escape room "The Moonlight Gallery" by Escape Room Downtown in Canton
review: I did The Moonlight Gallery with 7 friends tonight and we had a lot of fun. We escaped in about 35 minutes, but not without a little extra help with clues. It was definitely a challenge-but a good one, for sure. Will definitely go again to try out the other rooms, and they have plans for expansion many times over.

room_title: Escape room "The Moonlight Gallery" by Escape Room Downtown in Canton
review: This was my first escape room experience, and it was so much fun! My friends and I had a great time doing the Moonlight Gallery experience and we managed to finish in a half an hour with no hints. The puzzles were challenging, but not too frustrating or difficult. If you're on the fence, take a chance and go! You won't regret it.
